Name: Srinivas Yerramilli
Title: Heart touching Himachal driver
Review: Excellent ...5 Stars ⭐ for the driver named Ashok Kumar from Bilaspur (H.P)1)One ⭐ for Exceptional professional driving skills he had2) second ⭐ for Exceptional communication skills With lot of warmth and care he had3) Third ⭐ for Exceptional knowledge about local culture and epic stories and storytelling 4) Fourth ⭐ for Exceptional knowledge about  overall demographic socio- economic knowledge5) fifth  ⭐ for Exceptional care and concern he had for us makes the trip joyful adventures knowledgeable experience .... thank you Ashok Kumar ji...and guruji travels for hiring such a nice professional

Name: Sathish
Title: Unexpected Experience
Review: We hired an innova, the vehicle was good but the driver was worst, he was smoking in the vehicle and did not Stop for breaks and was forcing us use only his vendors

Name: richa p
Title: Tempo traveller burnt in front of our eyes.  Life threatening and pathetic
Review: Please do not ever travel with these people. They are cheaters. Our tempo which thy allocated to us was totally un maintained and it caught fire while on the roads with us all in it.  Even the fire extinguisher didnt work. And they are so negligent to humans. Never travel with them if you want you family to be safe.

Name: 268sarathm
Title: Great Experience with Guruji
Review: Travelled to Shimla and Manali with Guruji travels, MMT arranged the whole tour. The driver Rinku who is actually from Himachal was very professional and helpful. He drove very carefully especially through the hilly roads, Everyday Kumkum checked about the driver and the cab , Overall 5 stars to the team.A small request , Drivers are sleeping in the Cab in the minus degree outside the hotel, please consider to provide good salary\facility for them.

Name: Harry
Title: Worst experience with travel agent
Review: We met with a small accident via Manali to Shimla. The animal attacked our car during our journey and broke the glass of the rear door glass. We have requested the owner to replace the car or fix the glass. However, he refused to replace the car and created a false commitment to fix the glass. Yet, they did not fix the glass, and we travelled from Shimla to Delhi in a broken and uncleaned with small parts of broken glass.

Review: I went to shimla it was a nice trip, we enjoyed a lot , did shopping on mall road and took benefit of wonderful weather.

Name: Ravi C
Title: Best Experience
Review: Travel from Chandigarh-Shimla-Manali-Chandigarh. I booked this through MMT. I booked Innova Crysta..Driver Kishorilal was very professional. Five star rating for him. Enroute he always suggested good hotels for meals which is important esp when there are kids traveling. Only one suggestion...the AC of vehicle was not powerful. Due to hilly terrain it required to be switched off...but couldn't cope up when switched on..It was really hot Outside. Overall the road trip was fine...Ms. Kumkum used to call up n check on travel every day.. Thanks a lot.Milind
